ComicInfo.Summary:
THE LAST STAND OF CONAN, DARK AGNES, SOLOMON KANE & MOON KNIGHT!
CONAN and DARK AGNES face off against the servants of SET in STYGIA!
SOLOMON KANE and MOON KNIGHT encounter a bizarre relic - but will it aid their quest, or doom their compatriots?
And what deadly secret lurks in the mind of JAMES ALLISON?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Carlos Pacheco, Aneke & Frank D'Armata | 1 | Var | Virgin Connecting Variant Cover | Giuseppe Camuncoli & Jean-Francois Beaulieu | Missing | Var | Variant Cover | Kim Jacinto & Jesus Aburtov | 2 | Var | Variant Cover | Marcos Martin | 3 | Note: Includes the third part of a Solomon Kane four part novella entitled "The Get of Garm" written by C.L. Werner.
